title: New: Flatsound – I’m So Concerned About The Ending That I Don’t Even Know The Plot
content:
Flatsound knows how to cut right to the core.

Whether he’s waxing lyrical about sexual fetishes or as in this case, the emotional attachment to his mother, Mitch Welling has the rare gift of portraying a magnificent connection between the music and real life. With a new album soon, he’s released a short teaser containing six tracks that are, in his own words, the product of one night recording directly to cassette. Check out I’m So Concerned About The Ending That I Don’t Even Know The Plot and grab the full release here.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
